name: ogrpgrp

stmt.origin: simplbi(wcel(c0, cogrp), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, comnd))
stmt.pretty: simplbi(c0 ∈ oGrp, c0 ∈ Grp, c0 ∈ oMnd)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cogrp), wcel(c0, cgrp))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cogrp), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, comnd)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ oGrp → c0 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ oGrp ↔(c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c0 ∈ oMnd))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cogrp), wcel(c0, cgrp))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cogrp), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, comnd)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ oGrp → c0 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ oGrp ↔(c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c0 ∈ oMnd))

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, cogrp), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, comnd)))

comment: A left-ordered group is a group. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Jul-2018.)
